title: The Horse and its relatives
creator_credit: Coronet Productions and Chicago Zoological Society
brief_description: The horse and has been tamed and used by humans since the days of antiquity. In this film several of the animals b iologically related to the horse are studied, with emphasis on their physical characteristics and their habits in their natural surroundings - the zebra, the South American tapir, and the rhinoceros. These animals are very rarely tamed. Narrated by Vincent Pelletier.
